ValidationRule.description: Rejection Comments are required when rejecting a Lead.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName <> "MDU_MTU_Lead", OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Unqualified"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Rejected - Return to Nurture Stream"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Rejected - Disqualify") ), ISPICKVAL(Rejection_Reason__c,"Other - Please Explain"), ISBLANK(Rejection_Comments__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Rejection Comments are required when rejecting or unqualifying a Lead. Please enter Rejection Comments and save your changes.
